divs: Sighting DetailsIt was three A.M. and attached to my room is a balcony which faces due west. I walked out on my balcony to urinate and due west just above the treeline i saw a very bright orange light hovering. It hovered for approximately 5 minutes and then slowly went below the treeline in the distance where i could no longer see it. before disappearing it was dead still and very bright no flickering or pulsing or anything. I found this very interesting as I am a believer and wish the government would stop lying about many things to us.
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Virginia Beach
There were no other sightings in Virginia Beach on or around February 8th 2009
Summary: Bright orange light hovering then disappeared.
